name: Sanitation Shifters
description:
Sanitation Shifters is about Chip Anderson, the Garbage Drifting madman. It's a 3-D single-player (for now!) racing game created over the five-day "STOP WAITING FOR GODOT" jam hosted by Terry Cavanagh. It is our second game jam we've actually finished here at Hotcake, we appreciate you playing our game!

Controller recommended for gameplay! Keyboard supported.
(Note you need a keyboard to use the menu at the moment.)

Hotcake Studio will continue developing Sanitation Shifters t in the coming weeks until we feel like it's appropriate for a "full release." Expect Splitscreen, Career Mode, Bug fixes, and a lot more content soon! 

Follow the game www.hotcakestudio.com & @HotcakeStudio on Twitter

Shout out to Kenney for providing so many free assets, and like 99% of the ones we included in-game.

KNOW ISSUES (We did make this in a weekend after all...):
- Sounds not playing or looping at appropriate times

- Static Mesh causing the Truck to bump.

- Controller not interacting with the menu.

- Settings not saving.

If you find a bug hit us up!

Garbagebeat
There was also a small soundtrack album made in conjunction with the Jam for the game in the time frame. Not all of it is here because YouTube hates us and has a 10 video-a-day upload limit.
